channel.title: New: The Next Step
channel.desc: End of the Road. It's the final day of the Brawl, and Team Micheldon are going head-to-head with the Masked Sancers as The Next Step's last hope to save the studio. [S.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Drama
channel.desc: Chris responds to the network?s request for a holiday special by making the campers hunt for eggs. Who cares that it?s not Easter? And who cares if the hunt is for Cassowary eggs? With the teams now merged, it?s all about being the first one back with an egg and winning immunity.
